experiences.name: TheRightDoctors, Google Launchpad Startup
experiences.description: Built a behavior-based automation of mailers based on the response or interaction by a customer.Built a blogs recommendation system, based upon users current reading blog using Elastic Search MLT Query.Created a dashboard to dynamically to view and change the position of topics on website in real time.
